name: Maang teeka

name: Toe ring
description: Toe ring (also known as bicchiya) is commonly worn by married Hindu women in India the symbol of being married

name: Meenakari Jewlery
description: Meenakari is a Persian art of colouring the surface of metals by fusing brilliant colours

name: Polki jewelry
description: Polki is essentially an uncut diamond that is mined from the earth in a natural way without any enhancement

name: Ear piercings
description: The practice of using a needle or needle gun to make holes through the ear lobe or other parts of the ear

description: pendants are purely decorative. But a pendant may also hold a picture or a lock of hair of a lover or a child.

name: Bangle bracelets
description: A bangle is an inflexible but loose-fitting bracelet, worn alone or with many other bangles, on your wrist.

name: Choker necklace
description: A choker is a close-fitting necklace worn around the neck, typically 14 inch to 16 inch in length.
